JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Junior Campaign Specialist for Google Ads, Barcelona, Spain
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Danish speaking Junior Campaign Specialist for Google Ads, Barcelona, Spain.

Sun, Sea and Campaigns!

Barcelona offers the perfect mix of career opportunities and an adventurous lifestyle. The city is Famous for its stunning beaches, delicious food and world-class culture which makes it the ideal place for those looking to grow their careers while enjoying a year- round sunshine!

This is your opportunity to work as a Junior Campaign Specialist in Barcelona, you’ll have the opportunity to develop your skills in a dynamic industry while enjoying a rich cultural scene, excellent work-life balance, and year-round sunshine. Spain provides the perfect location for advancing your career and live life!

Purpose of the role:

In this dynamic role, you will work closely with a portfolio of new clients, helping them develop and launch their online advertising campaigns. You will have the opportunity to make a significant impact on their business growth by guiding them through the process and ensuring their success in the digital advertising world. This is a target-driven environment where you will work towards individual performance goals while collaborating with a larger onboarding team to deliver exceptional results. Your work will directly contribute to our clients’ success and the growth of their online presence.

Your key Responsibilities:
  • Act as a trusted advisor to Danish companies, guiding them in creating and optimizing digital advertising campaigns.
  • Identify business opportunities, recommend appropriate solutions, and help clients achieve measurable results.
  • Work towards individual sales targets while contributing to the overall success of the team.
  • Continuously analyze client needs and the effectiveness of campaigns, making data-driven adjustments to improve performance.
  • Collaborate with other team members to grow the client base and increase market presence across EMEA.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends and technologies to provide cutting-edge solutions to clients


What you can expect:
  • Full-time position (39h per week, Monday to Friday) with a Permanent Contract
  • Attractive salary conditions: from 23.876,19€ up to 30.000€ gross/year, plus a Sales bonus package: up to 3.407,96€ – 3.500€ gross/year
  • Hybrid working model in Barcelona
  • Relocation package: Includes flight ticket, 1-month accommodation, and private health insurance support
  • 3 weeks of intense training on Google Ads and specific sales training, with ongoing coaching for personal and professional development
  • Career growth opportunities: Established career path, continuous training, certifications within Google products, and fun contests


The ideal candidate:
  • Very good level of Danish
  • Ability to speak and write English fluently and idiomatically.
  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 6 months -1 Year of experience in advertising, PPC Campaigns
  • 6 months – 1 year of experience in outbound sales (preferably B2B)
  • A team player with strong leadership, analytical and communication skills.
  • Passionate about Marketing, technology, and online Advertising, with a desire to learn and develop.
  • If you don’t meet all the requirements, apply anyway! We will be delighted to meet you and find out what may be the best position for you!


Why Barcelona?

Barcelona offers the perfect blend of culture, history, and modern lifestyle. Known for its iconic architecture, scenic beaches, and vibrant creative scene, Barcelona is an ideal destination for both expats and professionals seeking career growth and personal enrichment. With its high quality of life, affordable housing, excellent public transportation, and welcoming international community, this Mediterranean city promises an unforgettable experience. Whether you’re soaking up the sun along the coastline, exploring Barcelona’s thriving arts and cultural scene, this dynamic city offers the perfect work-life balance. Experience the best of both worlds in Barcelona!

Work with our client!

Our client is a world leader in customer experience management and business process outsourcing, with over 420,000 employees across 88 countries, supporting clients in more than 265 languages and industries. Their mission is to deliver exceptional service while fostering a motivating and inspiring work environment. In Spain, they have over 4,700 employees across 10 sites, recognized as a Great Place to Work and Top Employer. They are currently seeking a creative, data-driven Campaign Specialist to join their innovative team. This is your chance to be part of a company where people are at the center of everything they do!

Ready for your adventure abroad? Apply today!

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/danish-junior-campaign-specialist-google-ads-products-spain/









Work International is a Nordic recruitment agency that helps people find, apply, and land their dream jobs abroad. Through partnerships with world-leading employers, we offer safe working conditions, attractive relocation packages and amazing work opportunities.

https://www.workinternational.com
